main event: Witnesses in Fontana, California reported seeing objects that initially appeared as a flying triangle which changed shape and merged into a circular object, suggesting a deliberate attempt to communicate with their lights and actions.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes., Witnesses described the objects at close range., The objects could change shape and were seen merging into one., The report suggests a communication attempt through lights., The incident was recorded by Project Blue Book.
sighted object: flying triangle and merging circular object
